title: The Let Them Theory
description: Mel Robbins offers transformative insights into personal growth and self-help strategies.

title: Onyx Storm (Deluxe Limited Edition)
description: Rebecca Yarros continues the Empyrean series with an enthralling fantasy adventure.

title: Sunrise on the Reaping
description: Suzanne Collins returns to Panem in this gripping prequel to the Hunger Games series.

title: Deep End
description: Ali Hazelwood delivers a compelling romance set against the backdrop of academic life.

title: Dog Man: Big Jim Begins
description: Dav Pilkey's latest installment in the Dog Man series brings humor and adventure for young readers.

title: The Crash
description: Freida McFadden crafts a psychological thriller that keeps readers on the edge of their seats.

title: Fourth Wing
description: Rebecca Yarros introduces a new realm of dragons and warriors in this captivating fantasy.

title: Scythe & Sparrow
description: Brynne Weaver's latest novel explores themes of love and destiny in a dystopian world.

title: Iron Flame
description: Rebecca Yarros continues her epic fantasy saga with intrigue and adventure.

title: The Housemaid
description: Freida McFadden presents a suspenseful tale of secrets and deception.

title: Atomic Habits
description: James Clear provides practical strategies for forming good habits and breaking bad ones.

title: Beautiful Ugly
description: Alice Feeney's latest novel delves into the complexities of human relationships.

title: Great Big Beautiful Life
description: Emily Henry crafts a heartwarming story about love and self-discovery.

title: Audition
description: Katie Kitamura explores themes of identity and performance in this thought-provoking novel.

title: My Friends
description: Fredrik Backman delivers a poignant tale of friendship and the passage of time.

title: Atmosphere
description: Taylor Jenkins Reid takes readers to the 1980s NASA Space Shuttle program in this engaging novel.

title: The Midnight Library
description: Matt Haig explores the infinite possibilities of life in this heartwarming novel.

title: The Creative Act: A Way of Being
description: Rick Rubin shares profound insights into the creative process and artistic inspiration.

title: Lessons in Chemistry
description: Bonnie Garmus tells the story of a brilliant woman who challenges societal norms in the 1960s.

title: The Covenant of Water
description: Abraham Verghese crafts an epic tale spanning generations in South India.
